attributes.review: i got this app to inform me of various political events and information and the first thing i see when i open the app is an image of a clown! i don’t know what the creators of the app intended with this but the marketing is very misleading. if i wanted jokes and clown let i would have hopped over to a different app. i am very disappointed.
attributes.title: incredibly disappointing

attributes.review: This app horrible. The creator and person basis of this app are just outrageous people disgusting in my opinion. I would only get this app to give it a one star review, negative is I could.
attributes.title: NO NO NO

attributes.review: this app doesn’t work at all. It’s an absolute piece of trash and a reflection of the president of the United States. Always glitches. Never works. I hate it more than I hate myself.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: Slowed my phone down to the point where it just went blank and I had to take it in and replaced it....
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: This app immediately started advertising racism and claiming that dinosaurs aren’t real, like this app is such bs. I give this app a 1 star cause it also stole the passenger seat to my car
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app is horrible. It stole my fridge and looked at me weird. I can’t believe this app is even available in America. Disgusting piece of trash. Waste of space. Glitchy as crap app.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app made me go into cardiac arrest and then my dog took a dookie on my bed and I cut my finger on my moms ring then I had to jump in front of a car and take my pet dragon outside for a walk and eat some Cheetos
attributes.title: Poopy 💩💩💩

attributes.review: downloaded this app, and my phone glitched out and i couldn’t use it for the whole day. my dog had to walk my phone on the charger DO NOT GET THIS APP.
attributes.title: do not get if yu want ya phone to glitch like crazy

attributes.review: is takes weeks to download with good Internet, I phone started acting slow, and glitchy, I couldn’t do anything, when I delete my phone was back to normal. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS IS APP IS TRASH
attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to receive news updates but after a careful analysis i realized it was all fake news. it was very racist and homophobic, it upset my pan sexual african american polar bear and i demand it be removed!!!😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: DISGUSTING
